Welcome.title: Welcome to Next.js!
Welcome.description: This is a sample application using Next.js App Router
Welcome.multiLanguageslDescription: This template supports multiple languages with Next-Intl, automatically detecting the browser language and redirecting users to the appropriate language. You can add more languages by creating JSON files in the messages folder.
Welcome.author: Author: Dr. Dao Quang (Dao Quang Official)
Welcome.donateDescription: If you find this application useful, please consider donating to support me so I can continue developing other open-source projects.
